Function reference

All functions

add_age_cat() add_age_18_cat()
Add categories of age
add_child_sep_cat()
Add child separation categories
add_drinking_water_source_cat() add_drinking_water_time_cat() add_drinking_water_time_threshold_cat()
Drinking water source recoding
add_dummy_from_dummies()
Add a dummy variable from dummies
add_dummy_from_set()
Add a dummy variable when any string from a set of strings
add_edu_access_d()
Add education access dummy
add_fds_cannot_cat()
Add functional domestic space tasks categories
add_hoh_final()
Head of household final values (from respondent skip logic)
add_income_source_cat()
Add income source categories, count, and top 3
add_income_source_prop()
Add income source amount as proportions of total income
add_income_source_zero_to_sl()
Add zero when the income source was skipped
add_loop_age_dummy() add_loop_age_dummy_to_main() add_loop_age_gender_dummy() add_loop_age_gender_dummy_to_main()
Add a dummy variable for an age class
add_loop_healthcare_needed_cat() add_loop_healthcare_needed_cat_main()
Add healthcare needed category to loop data (incl. WGQ-SS if provided)
add_loop_wgq_ss() add_loop_wgq_ss_to_main()
Prepare dummy variables for each WG-SS component (individual data)
add_occupancy_cat()
Add the category of occupancy arrangement
add_received_assistance()
Add received assistance (combined calculation)
add_sanitation_facility_cat() add_sharing_sanitation_facility_cat() add_sharing_sanitation_facility_num_ind()
Sanitation facility classification
add_shelter_issue_cat()
Add the number of shelter issues and related category
add_shelter_type_cat()
Combines both shelter types questions and recodes the type of shelter.
are_cols_numeric()
Stop statement values are not numeric
are_values_in_range()
Stop statement values are not in range
are_values_in_set()
Stop statement values are not in set
choices_update
Some choices sheet, updated
comp_foodsec()
Food security sectoral composite - add score and dummy for in need
comp_health()
Health composite - add score and dummy for in need
comp_prot()
Protection composite - add score and dummy for in need
comp_snfi()
SNFI sectoral composite - add score and dummy for in need
count_if_above_zero()
Create dummy variables and count across if above zero
dummy_raw_data
Some MSNA dummy data A list of datasets with "main" for household-level, "roster" for demographics, "edu_ind" for individual education variables, "health_ind" for individual health variables, and "nut_ind" for individual nutrition variables.
if_not_in_stop()
Stop statement "If not in colnames" with colnames
impute_value() impute_median()
Impute missing values
is_in_need()
Add a dummy variable 'is in need'
loa
Some analysis DAP
num_cat()
Add categories for a numeric variable
rank_top3_vars()
Function to add top 3 columns out of numeric variables
subvec_in()
Subvec in
subvec_not_in()
Subvec not in
sum_vars()
Function to sum up columns row-wise.
survey_update
Some survey sheet, updated
value_to_sl()
Add a value to variables that were skipped

Developed by Guillaume Noblet.
